title: Mondelez International
summary: Mondelez International, Inc. (/ˌmoʊndəˈliːz/),[3] often stylized as Mondelēz, is an American multinational confectionery, food, holding and beverage and snack food company based in Chicago, Illinois.[4] Mondelez has an annual revenue of about $26 billion and operates in approximately 160 countries.[5] It ranked No. 108 in the 2021 Fortune 500 list of the largest United States corporations by total revenue.[6]
